alert.note: Alert for Northern Bristol; Southern Worcester; Western Norfolk (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 24 at 5:53PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...Heavy rainfall will impact portions of southeastern Worcester, southwestern Norfolk, northwestern Bristol, northeastern Kent, eastern Providence and northwestern Bristol Counties through 645 PM EDT... At 552 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a heavy rainfall over Providence, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Minor flooding. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor nuisance flooding of typically flood prone areas. Locations impacted include... Providence, Warwick, Cranston, Pawtucket, East Providence, Woonsocket, Cumberland, North Providence, Franklin, West Warwick, Johnston, North Attleborough, Attleboro, Mansfield, Smithfield, Lincoln, Central Falls, Norton, Foxborough, and Bellingham. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Do not drive through flooded roads or underpasses. Avoid low lying areas near small streams.

area.areaDesc: Northern Bristol; Southern Worcester; Western Norfolk
